name: Jury-Rigged
description:
This game was made as a assignment in SC-T-624-CGDD at Reykjavik University in 2018.What is Jury-Rigged

Jury-rigged is a party racing game where 2-4 players race identical ship, taking turns placing thrusters on the spaceship and then race the changed ship.

Controls

You can either use the keyboard or any XInput controller

Controller Controls

  • D-pad  for movement and  0 key  (A button on Xbox) as action button

Keyboard Controls

  • Player 1 uses W - A - S - D  for movement and  E  as action button
  • Player 2 uses  ↑ - ← - ↓ - →  for movement and  Return  as action button
  • Player 3 uses  T - F - G - H  for movement and  Y  as action button
  • Player 4 uses  I - J - K - L  for movement and  O  as action button

Creators

  • Andri Þór Sveinbjörnsson - Naddinn
  • Benedikt Sverrir Halldórsson - Bennisverrir
  • Smári Freyr Guðmundsson - Clover89
  • Snorri Arinbjarnar - SnorriArinbjarnar
